title: playground: go/ast Print example fails to print all output in playground
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

Run http://play.golang.org/p/OI6mTul6Dh

What is the expected output?

As shown in http://golang.org/pkg/go/ast/#example_Print
If you press "Run" button in the package doc example, however, you will
observe the same problem.

What do you see instead?

Only the first 8 lines are printed.

Please provide any additional information below.

- Adding fmt.Println("") after ast.Print(fset, f) makes all output flushed
properly, but println("") doesn't make any difference.
- Adding fmt.Println() after ast.Print(fset, f) prints out garbages.
- This problem is observed only in playground. No issue with go run command.
